automaticThoughtRecorder.title: Record Automatic Thought
automaticThoughtRecorder.header: Practice this skill by recording your most common automatic thought :

options.title: I am going to make a fool of myself
I will never find a partner!

recordEmotion.title: IDENTIFY EMOTIONS
recordEmotion.header: Pick the emotions you feel related to automatic thoughts you entered

categoryRecorder.title: Categorize ATs
categoryRecorder.header: Add a category to the Automatic Thought you recorded earlier:

categories.title: Mind reading
categories.info: You assume that you know what people think without having sufficient evidence of their thoughts.

categories.title: Fortunetelling
categories.info: You predict the future negatively: Things will get worse, or there is danger ahead.

categories.title: Catastrophizing
categories.info: You believe that what has happened or will happen will be so awful and unbearable that you won’t be able to stand it.

categories.title: Labeling
categories.info: You assign global negative traits to yourself and others.

categories.title: Discounting positives
categories.info: You claim that the positive things you or others do are trivial.

categories.title: Negative filtering
categories.info: You focus almost exclusively on the negatives and seldom notice the positives.

categories.title: Overgeneralizing
categories.info: You perceive a global pattern of negatives on the basis of a single incident.

categories.title: All-or-Nothing
categories.info: You view events or people in all-or-nothing terms.

categories.title: Shoulds
categories.info: You interpret events in terms of how things should be, rather than simply focusing on what is.

categories.title: Personalizing
categories.info: You attribute a disproportionate amount of the blame to yourself for negative events, and you fail to see that certain events are also caused by others.
